General.Name: Sajo Ind
General.Description: Sajo Industries Company Limited operates as a food company. It provides marine, food, livestock, and leisure products under the Sajo brand. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Sung-Woong  Lee
1.Title: Managing Director and Director of Busan Region Division

2.Name: Myung-Ho  Lee
2.Title: Managing Director and Director of Busan Region Division
